alert.note: Alert for Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Snowy and Judith Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 07 at 12:36PM MST until November 09 at 9:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 3 and 6 inches. * WHERE...Snowy and Judith Mountains, Fergus County below 4500ft and Judith Basin County and Judith Gap. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect periods of snow through Wednesday evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Snowy and Judith Mountains
